DOC.criteria: Aged 660 month Permanently reside study area Being moderately mildly stunt ( heightforage zscore < 1.5 SD ) Informed consent parent guardian obtain Severe waste ( weightforheight zscore < 3 SD ) Hemoglobin concentration < 70 g/L Axillary temperature ≥37.50 °C malaria antigenemia Signs symptom randomisation suggest malaria , hepatitis , HIV/AIDS , tuberculosis , sickle cell disease severe condition Unable produce venous blood sample ( > 1 mL )
